Package peersim.kademlia

Class KademliaObserver

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.KademliaObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
peersim.core.Control
public class KademliaObserver extends Object implements peersim.core.Control
This class implements a simple observer of search time and hop average in finding a node in the network
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniele Furlan, Maurizio Bonani
